text: The Agility is a lightweight scooter made by Kymco. It comes in both 50cc and 125cc variants (2009 - present) It can accommodate a rider and passenger.http://www.redbook.com.au/bikes/research/used/details/2012-kymco- agility-rs-125-623309?csn_tnet=true It has an underseat storage box for a full face helmet. ==References== Category:Motor scooters Category:Kymco motorcycles
title: Kymco Agility
